Writer: Jim Wheat (characters), Ken Wheat (characters), David Twohy
Title: The Chronicles of Riddick
Actors: Vin Diesel, Colm Feore, Thandie Newton, Judi Dench
Plot: The wanted criminal Riddick arrives on a planet called Helion Prime, and finds himself up against an invading empire called the Necromongers, an army that plans to convert or kill all humans in the universe.
